title: My friend doesn't see my name in the gifting center!
body: So my friend seems to have a problem; they can't find my name in the gifting center when they choose a person. I also cannot find their name in the list of friends as well, even though we're friends. Please help! :c

replies.body: you have to be in his friends list for 1 to 2 days atleast
Oh, that stinks. Alright, thank you!

Are you guys recently friends?  There is a short period as part of some[ gifting restrictions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ)before you can gift someone.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Yeah, I became friends with them yesterday night!
